reviews.comments: La verdad me sentí como en casa, el depto queda cerca de todo, fácil acceso. Carolina muy amable y flexible tanto como para el check in y check out. Totalmente recomendable!
Exelente depto muy bien ubicado y muy moderno.
Todo perfecto! Muy buena ubicacion , el departamento muy lindo y confortable! Lujan muy bien predispuesta! Lo recomiendo! Saludos!

Excelente atención! Todo de diez. 
Muy amable y predispuesta siempre.

Departamento muy lindo, bien equipado para pasar unos días agradables. Limpio ordenado y confortable.  (Tal cual se ve en las fotos) buena vista y orientación. Muy luminoso,(con balcón) Las camas bien, el baño actualizado muy lindo, la ducha un tanto pequeña pero funcional. La cocina completa y bien equipada. TV, aire acondicionado y wi-fi funcionan perfectamente. La comunicación con Carolina y Lujan 10 puntos "genial" super agradables y atentas. Pasamos unos días muy lindos en Salta. Volveremos!!! Gracias

Muchas Gracias Carolina!!!! Bellisimo Depto!!!! Desde el living y el balcon se ve la Ciudad y el Cerro de Salta!!!! Excelente ubicacion!!!! Nos comunicamos con Lujan nos recibio muy amable!!!! La pasamos muy lindo en Salta!!!! Gracias chicas volveremos a alojarnos!!!!

Todo espectacular, tal cual lo descrito y publicado! El departamento está impecable y súper comodo! 
Todo de 10!
El Departamento es tal cual las fotos, muy buena ubicación.

Somos un matrimonio y estuvimos una semana en el departamento de Carolina, estuvo muy lindo todo, el departamento muy cómodo y limpio con todo lo que se necesita para pasar unos días espectaculares. Nos recibió Luján que fue muy amable y nos explicó algunas excursiones para hacer y nos recomendó agencias de turismo con las que tuvimos la suerte de conocer los lugares divinos de Salta. Para ir al centro, solamente caminábamos unas 5 cuadras y ya estábamos allí. Recomiendo 100%. Muchas gracias!

Nuestro vuelo llego un poco demorado y Carolina nos espero en el departamento sin problemas. Es cómodo, funcional, tal cual se ve en las fotos. Ubicados a pocas cuadras del centro. Carolina nos consiguió una cochera a una cuadra y media del departamento. Todo genial!!

Todo perfecto. Departamento de acuerdo a las imágenes en un edifio nuevo bien ubicado
De acuerdo a las expectativas 
Muy recomendable.
No hay ningún aspecto negativo
El departamento es ideal para una pareja. Se encuentra cerca del centro de la ciudad y en una zona tranquila por las noches. Super recomendable para alojarse en Salta!

El departamento es muy comodo y muy bien equipado. Tiene todo lo necesario para que la estadia sea perfecta. A unos minutos del centro. El edificio es seguro al igual que la zona donde esta ubicado. Las imagenes responden tal cual. Muy lindo y moderno. Si volvemos a Salta elegiríamos sin dudas el departamento de Carol. Muy amable y servicial en la comunicación.

El departamento tiene todas las comodidades, limpio, sin ruidos y bastante espacioso. Está a 5cuadras de la plaza principal y quizás un poco más alejado de la zona de las peñas en la calle balcarce pero se puede hacer a pie tranquilamente o bien en un taxi. Muy recomendable la atención de Carolina es muy gentil respondiendo a todas las dudas.

La atención fue óptima y el departamento es tal cual la descripción y fotos, muy luminoso, cómodo y limpio. Carolina super atenta y dispuesta a escuchar cualquier consulta. Muchas gracias por hospedarnos!
reviews.response: Gracias a ustedes por la comprensión!

reviews.comments: Carolina fue muy amable ayudándonos en todo momento de nuestra corta estadía. Se preocupo de todos los detalles. El Depto es tal cual las fotos!! Esta muy cerca del centro y muy funcional. Lo recomendaremos a nuestros amigos

El departamento se encuentra muy bien equipado, es super amplio y cómodo. Su ubicación es muy buena, a pocas cuadras de la plaza principal. Carolina es una persona muy atenta. Recomendamos este hospedaje.

Muy lindo departamento, moderno, espacioso y bien ubicado, ya que se encuentra cerca del centro de la ciudad de Salta. Carolina fue muy amable y siempre estuvo atenta a nuestras necesidades. Luego de mostrarnos el departamento se tomó unos minutos para indicarnos dónde podíamos conseguir comida, tomar un café y presenciar una peña.
Si tenemos la suerte de volver a visitar Salta, sin dudas elegiríamos hospedarnos nuevamente aquí.

Carolina es una anfitriona excelente, nos estaba esperando cuando llegamos, nos dio recomendaciones turísticas y nos explicó algunas cosas del barrio. El departamento está muy bien ubicado, y está muy completo y decorado con muy buen gusto. Volveremos a llamarla cuando volvamos a Salta. Gracias Carolina!

la disposiciòn del estudio/monoambiente, su diseño y ambientaciòn en la forma que lo ha hecho Carolina, solo merece felicitaciones... 
La ubicaciòn, (a pocas cuadras del centro), luminosidad y pequeños detalles de elegante gusto, suman puntos para una estadìa muy agradable. TV y wifi, impecables. 
La cordialidad y simpatìa de Carolina no son un detalle màs, sino el que hace que quien se hospedò en su estudio y tenga que regresar a Salta capital, por el motivo que fuere, no dude en buscar ese mismo lugar para sentirse muy bien en una ciudad cordial.

Las fotos muestran exactamente como es el departamento.  Muy cómodo,  muy limpio,  bien distribuido,  se siente amplio.  El edificio es nuevo y tranquilo, el portero amable y servicial.  La ubicación es excelente,  a las cuadras del centro.  Carolina es una gran anfitriona,  muy buen trato y atenta a todas las necesidades. Te asesora con buena información cuando llegas. Muy recomendable.  Espero poder volver
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tu visita, esperamos que vuelvas!

reviews.comments: Carolina es muy amable y atenta. Nos orientó en todo momento y siempre esta dispuesta a ayudarte en caso que lo necesites. El departamento es nuevo, impecable, al igual que todo lo que se encuentra en la cocina. Estaba todo muy limpio. La vista es hermosa y la ubicación ideal. A sólo 5 cuadras del centro, conveniente para aquellos que no vamos en auto. Los colectivos pasan todos a 2/3 cuadras del departamento. Ideal!!! Lo recomiendo!!!!
reviews.response:
Gracias por tus comentarios Mara, ya mismo salgo a comprar un abre latas! 
Es por estas cosas que sus comentarios son importantes para que podamos mejorar.
Saludos y que estés muy bien.

reviews.comments:
Nuestra estadía en el departamento de Caro fue muy confortable y tranquila.
El mismo está muy bien ubicado, a solo 6 cuadras de la plaza principal. Es muy nuevo, recien estrenado y está decorado  con muy buen gusto y perfectamente equipado.
La cama es amplia y cómoda y por las noches el barrio es silencioso.  El Internet funciona muy bien.
Carolina y su esposo nos recibieron muy atentos y nos dieron todas las recomendaciones para que pudiéramos aprovechar al máximo nuestra corta estadía. Son una pareja de lo mas agradable.
Recomendamos ampliamente su depto, especialmente para viajeros sin auto, ya que está cerca de todo.
Me recibió mu bien fue muy gentil, el departamento es muy comodo la pase genial, muchas gracias!
Un lugar muy recomendable, con excelentes anfitriones y una casa ideal.

El apartamiento de Carolina es espectacular. Moderno y muy cómodo, es un studio más grande que parece en las fotos. Situado a menos des diez minutos de la plaza central. Perfecto para aprovechar de Salta y relajarse!
Muy lindo el departamento,  bien completo, muy limpio y bien decorado, la atención al recibirnos fue excelente, y la ubicación es ideal, cerca del centro pero zona tranquila, altamente recomendable

El Apartamento es tal cual reflejan las fotos, en un edificio nuevo y muy próximo al Centro de la Ciudad, 4 cuadras.
Carolina en todo momento estuvo en contacto con nosotros facilitando todo tipo de información. Nos sentimos muy cómodos en su Departamento, por lo cual repetiríamos en el caso de volver a Salta.
Absolutamente perfecto el piso!

Nos encantó nuestra estadía con Carolina y su departamento hermoso!! Carolina es una anfitriona muy cálida y responsiva. El departamento es precioso, limpio, y bien equipado con todo lo que se necesita para hacerse cómodo. La ubicación es ideal, y se puede caminar fácilmente a muchos de los sitios turísticos de la ciudad. Nos sentimos seguras en el barrio y también el edificio. Recomendamos 100% una estadía en el departamento y Carolina como anfitriona!!
The host canceled this reservation 114 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 26 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Appartamento pulito nuovo e carino.
La proprietaria ci ha consentito un check-in presto la mattina, cosa che abbiamo gradito molto.
L’appartamento non si trova nella zona dove ci sono locali e ristoranti, ma più esterno a 10 minuti dal centro.
Vicini rumorosi.
Great area just a short walk to town. Clean apartment, perfect location, great value
Lovely studio in a great location.

When my flight got cancelled, I booked Carolina's place on short notice and really appreciated the quick response and swift check-in. Very nice apartment in Salta city (10 min walk from the main square).

Carolina's place was great.  It was very central to the city - although a bit further than I expected (a bit more than a 10 min walk to the main square). The apartment was clean and nicely decorated. Also walkable to the main bar area, but again a bit of a longer walk. We had a complaint of a leak from the apartment below, although this didn't end up effecting our trip, I don't know how it was resolved. I would stay at Carolina's again!
The apartment felt like home instantly. Clean, cozy, central with everything you need located in a safe building. We can definitely recommend the place!

This appartment is great! It is near by the city center and a supermarket! The appartment was very clean and it gives you a cozy feeling, which makes it feel like home. Salta is a nice place with a little city center with Nice places to visit! We would definitely come here again and stay in this appartment!

Wir waren 3 Tage in Salta und wollten kein teures Hotel bezahlen. Aufgrund dessen mieteten wir die Wohnung Carolina für ungefähr 190 euro für vier Nächte. Sehr freundlich wurden wir von Luján ( die Geschäftspartnerin von Carolina) empfangen. Die Wohnung ist sauber, sehr zentral ( etwa 5 cuadras von der Plaza principal) und vor allem hat sie einen wunderschönen Ausblick. Man findet in der Wohnung alles was man braucht von Seife und Shampoo bis zu einem Mate-Set. 

Es gab so gut wie nichts störendes an der Wohnung. 

Alles in allem ist die Wohnung eine tolle Alternative zu einem Hotel in der man sich sehr Zuhause fühlt.
Carolina was an excellent host and the flat is fantastic and exactly as it appears in the pictures and description: super new, super central and super clean.  We'd definitely choose it again!
Lovely place close to town and nicely set up. It was a bit cold in winter though and very light. Enjoyed the place very much though
Caroline's place is very good and we enjoyed our stay. Richard and Maite

Such a great place with a great host. Salta is lovely and a great place to stop for a good few days if you have been travelling a while. 

The flat has everything you need and Carolina has obviously thought about what you need to actually live in a flat (the proper things to actually cook, eat and clean with unlike many Airbnb's) and she gave us really good recommendations. 

She's decorated the place really well and it was the nicest place we stayed in Argentina.
The host canceled this reservation 199 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a really nice time at Carolinas apartment. Everything is exactly as described and very clean. Check in and check out worked smoothly and Carolina was really flexible.

I spent a week at Carolinas studio and felt fine there. The studio is located on the 4th floor of relatively new building, a 10' walk from the main square. From the small balcony (oriented to the south, so there is almost no sun) you have an overview of Salta and can even see the top of the cathedral. The kitchenette is well equipped, I only missed a coffee machine. The studio is very clean. Corolina did welcome me warmly. She speaks english very well.

This was definitely one of the nicer Airbnb's I have stayed in throughout Argentina. The pictures depict the apartment accurately. It is very clean and spacious. The location is perfect because it is a short walk away from the main square with restaurants and attractions. Communicating with Caroline was very easy and she was extremely accommodating. I would highly recommend staying here to anyone visiting Salta! PS - this was the only airbnb we stayed at that had sharp knives.
Carolina accommodated us in many ways. We really enjoyed our stay at her place!!! Thank you Caroline!

Carolina'a place is excellent. Well furnished, clean and an excellent kitchen! Carolina is very friendly and happy to share tips on Salta. The location is fantastic, just five blocks away from the city centre. Thanks for a great stay, would stay here again if in Salta!

We spend a great time in Salta. Carol was a very nice host and she gave us very good tips what to do and to see in and arround Salta.

The flat is very cosy and clean, and located just a few blocks outside the city center.

The apartment looks very nice and is well decorated as shown on the pictures. Walking distance to the center of Salta and some coffee bars just around the corner.
Can be a bit noisy because of the traffic in the street but definitely worth the money!

Un grand merci à Carolina !!!!
L'appartement est PARFAIT, on s'y sent très bien: il est spacieux, bien équipé, très clean et bien situé (vous pouvez tout faire à pied). L'immeuble est très safe.
Nous n'avons pas vu Carolina mais elle est disponible par (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) et est très réactive. Elle nous a super bien conseillée pour déjeuner et est flexible sur le check out.
Nous reviendrons chez elle si nous revenons à Salta !!!
Merci encore !

My boyfriend and I spent 3 nights at Carolina's flat and really enjoyed ourselves. The flat is lovely, very clean and beautifully decorated. The bed is comfortable and big, and the shower consistently has hot water. The flat is perfect for relaxing in, and we spent a rainy day indoors without feeling cramped. 

Carolina is a wonderful host. She makes contact from early on, and responds very quickly. She goes out of her way to make sure your stay is as comfortable and smooth as possible. We were leaving late in the evening, and she made the extra effort to make sure we could leave our luggage somewhere so we didn't have to take our luggage around with us for the whole day. We really appreciated this. It's this flexibility that makes her, in my opinion, such an exceptional host.

Thank you for a great stay Carolina! We would definitely come back.

Sehr freundlicher Empfang, die Wohnung ist einen sehr guten Zustand und recht geschmackvoll eingerichtet, alles funktionierte einwandfrei ebenso der WiFi-Empfang. In unmittelbarer Umgebung, Bäckereien, Fleischereien, Cafes, große und kleine Supermärkte. Das Zentrum und auch das Vergnügungsviertel in der Balcare sind zu Fuß gut zu erreichen. Die Tourbusse der örtlichen Reiseveranstalter haben uns vor der Haustür abgeholt.
reviews.response: Thanks Klaus for your kind review.

reviews.comments:
Great place in good location (5min walk from main plaza). Carolina was a great host who even adjust for our late arrival due to the bus delay. 
I recommend this place to anybody, visiting Salta.

We loved staying at Carolina's beautiful apartment.  It was immaculate, bright and welcoming and it had everything we needed. The big bed was very comfortable!  Carolina was so lovely and communication was easy. She helped us with booking buses and looked into currency exchange for us.
Very nice appartement, beautiful and clean. Great location ! Carolina explained everything when we arrived and has always been available for any questions. We had great days thank you for all !
reviews.response:
Thanks Steven, will consider you suggestion.
Regards

reviews.comments: I had an excellent experience staying in Carolina's apartment! The apartment is incredibly clean, spotless, and fully equipped.  The building is also relatively new with many modern amenities and features.  The apartment is very centrally located in Salta within a safe neighborhood and is within close walking distance of all the major tourist attractions in the city.  There is also a nice view of the city from the apartment balcony.  Carolina was a wonderful host who made me feel very welcome and was very quick to respond to any of my messages or inquiries.  I highly recommend this apartment and will use it as my first choice of residence next time I am in Salta!
reviews.response:
Great review! very detailed, many thanks for taking your time to right it.
Regards
Carolina

reviews.comments: Carolina was a very nice host. Our bus got delayed for 3 hours and she has waited for us. The apartment was nice, cozy, and clean. Very good and fast wifi as well. Centrally located and every main sight is in the walking distance. We really enjoyed our stay in Salta at Carolina's :)
Lovely clean apartment in salta. Host very communicative and helpful. 5 blocks away from main square. Would happily stay again. Thanks!

Carolina was very friendly and was there waiting for us when we arrived. The apartment is centrally located and it felt very safe and was very cozy and quiet. All is just as pictured and even a little better! Thanks Carolina!

Met on time as planned 
Great welcome

Cozy studio, really is cozy! It's a fantastic appartment at an ideal location. It has everything you need when you want to spend a night in the appartment (instead of a restaurant). Carol really was a great host, helping us when we mixed up the departure date of our bus to San Pedro de Atacama and where forced to stay another night. Communication was fast and positive. If you intend to stay in Salta, then we really recommend this place. The city itself isn't really worth the travel, but the tours to Cafayate and the Salines Grandes are!

Clean apartment, in a modern building, with all basic commodities, very near the city center, as described in the profile!
Carolina was kind, punctual, helpful, informative and a fluent English speaker.
Thanks for everything!

Very nice apartment with city views and only 5 mins walk from the main square. Host was very friendly considerate and recommended a great place for dinner on our first night! We enjoyed the apartment and our stay in salta very much

Carolina was a quintessential 5 star AirBnB host.  The apartment was exactly as it was described in words and photos on the website.  We arrived later in the evening (around 8pm) and Carolina graciously met us on our time table.  She gave us a great walk through of the apartment and it's features as well as a great run-down of the local area.  Where to eat, where to shop, etc.  She also gave us the low-down on a killer dinner spot where the locals eat, which was one of the highlights of our entire Argentina trip.

The apartment is cozy, but well appointed.  The kitchen is a great size and has everything you would need if you want to do some home cooking.  The entire apartment is well lit and feels right.  She did a very mindful job of decorating the place as it feels "homey."

We had to depart a little earlier in the morning, and she was very accommodating with our check-out as well.

All-in-all, this was an excellent location, a fantastic apartment and Carolina was a top-notch host!

If you are going to be in Salta, then this is the place to stay. Carolina is English speaking and very helpful. Always on call to help out and respond to questions. The apartment is light and spacious and a slow 10 minute stroll from the centre.
Carolina is a wonderful host.  Her place was very comfortable, clean, tidy, new and well equipped.  She's very nice and helpful.  We had a wonderful stay there.

This is simply a great place to stay in Salta.
Located not far from the main square of the city, yet had still calm and peaceful neighborhood.
Carolina is definitely a kind and welcoming host, you will find her cleanness and good taste very soon; really, it is a clean place.
We loved the view from its balcony. Recommended.

Plus, Salta is a good city to stay for a few days, and do not worry about its safety too much. Generally, it is a safe city.

An unbelievable experience made all the better by this amazingly located apartment. Only 500 metres from Santa's main square where you will find a plethora of restaurants and things to see and do. The apartment was super clean and tidy and the air con was great! Good internet connection too. Thx Caro!
reviews.response: Gracias a ustedes Ivan, realmente un placer recibirlos y que hayan disfrutado tanto.

reviews.comments: We spent one night in the flat, it is very nice, very well situated. Carolina is a nice host with good advices about the restaurants or things to do near Salta, we enjoyed our stay in the flat, we recommend it !

Carolina was a great host. She was super helpful and very accommodating. The apartment is very clean, bright, large and close to the centre. The view from the balcony was great.  We would definitely stay there again. 

Thanks!

A friend and I stayed at Carolyn's place for 3 days. Everything was very clean and well placed. Carolyn was very courteous and helped us choose the best itineraries around salta. Also, I really liked the location. Hope this helps.
Nice little studio! Made us feel very welcome.  Gave us recommendations for places to eat.  Central location.

Carolina was very warm and welcoming. She suggested a very good tour company and restaurants. Her apartment is very clean and comfortable as well as well located. You can walk easily to the main plaza. She was very responsive and allowed us to check out a little late and leave our bags for the day. She even called us a taxi to get to the airport. We recommend you stay at her place.

We really enjoyed staying at Carolina's place. It's very clean and nicely decorated. The neighbourhood is very close to the main square and you have a great view from the apartment balcony. Carolina is a kind and warm person and we easily felt at home at her apartment. We highly recommend this place.
We had a great stay in Carolina's apartment. It was perfect for what we needed - it was clean, in a good location and had all the amenities.
Ein sehr schön eingerichtetes Apartment in einer guten Gegend in Salta. Das Apartment war sehr sauber und gut ausgestattet. Carolina war sehr hilfsbereit und schnell in der Kommunikation.

Carolina's cozy studio was the perfect place to stay in Salta.  I highly recommend staying here.   It is in a great part of the city and you can easily walk to Salta's main attractions.  It is quite close to the theatre that hosts free music concerts too. Carolina and her husband were very friendly and helpful hosts.  They recommended good restaurants and called us a taxi when we had to go to the airport.
reviews.response: Thank you for your visit! hope to have you back some day.

reviews.comments: Appartamento molto carino, ben tenuto, ordinato e pulito. Carolina è una host molto solare, attenta, prodiga di consigli sulle attività in salta, sui ristoranti e sulle escursioni.  Esperienza davvero positiva
